design_audit.running_variable_definition: date - auto_date (days from automation of pollution monitoring station)
design_audit.residualization_note: Outcome is residualized from reghdfe with station FE, month FE, and weather controls before entering rdrobust

claim_object.outcome_concept: Reported PM10 air pollution concentration (daily station-level)
claim_object.treatment_concept: Automation of pollution monitoring (replacing manual reporting with automated instruments)
claim_object.estimand_concept: Sharp RD local effect of automation on reported PM10 at the date of station automation
claim_object.target_population: Chinese air pollution monitoring stations automated in waves during 2013-2014

baseline_specs.label: Table1A-Row1-Col2
baseline_specs.notes: Residualized PM10 (station FE + month FE + weather), all sample, daily data. This is the primary specification with full controls absorbed via residualization.

constraints.residualization_note: Controls enter through pre-residualization, not directly in rdrobust. Varying controls means varying the residualization step.
constraints.bandwidth_constraints: MSE-optimal bandwidth selected by rdrobust; manual bandwidth variants use fractions/multiples of baseline
constraints.data_construction_note: station_day_1116.dta is generated by Prepare_Data.do from pollution_1116.dta + weather_1116.dta + station_list.dta. station_month.dta is also generated. The runner must either replicate this merge or use the generated files if available.

core_universe.baseline_spec_ids_note: baseline__raw_pm10 is the unresidualized RD (Table 1A Row1 Col1). Monthly AOD has been moved to diagnostics_plan as a falsification outcome (satellite-measured pollution should not change at automation date).

canonical.notes: Clustered at city level, matching paper's baseline vce(cluster code_city)

diagnostics_plan.notes: McCrary-style density test at automation date (rddensity command)
RD estimates on weather variables (temp, rain, rh, wind_speed) as placebo outcomes; Table B2 in paper

RD on monthly AOD (satellite-measured pollution); should show null effect since satellite measurement is unaffected by station automation. Table 1A Row 2. Uses station_month.dta with running variable n_month.
